text: The Name of the Rose is a 1986 German Italian French mystery drama movie directed by Jean-Jacques Annaud and was based on the 1980 novel of the same name by Umberto Eno. It stars Sean Connery, F. Murray Abraham, Christian Slater, Helmut Qualtinger, Michael Lonsdale, Donal O'Brian, Ron Perlman, Andrew Birkin and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1986 drama movies Category:1986 mystery movies Category:German drama movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Jean-Jacques Annaud
title: The Name of the Rose (movie)
